edge_1: Marlin becomes overprotective of his only surviving child after a barracuda eats all but one of their eggs. Nemo is the last remaining egg.
edge_2: Nemo starts his first day at school and has a heated argument with his father, Marlin, regarding his parenting approach.

edge_1: Marlin becomes overprotective of his only surviving child after a barracuda eats all but one of their eggs. Nemo is the last remaining egg.
edge_2: Nemo blocks the filter tube with a pebble to allow the Tank Gang to escape, but fails and is almost killed by the machinery.

edge_1: Marlin meets Dory, a blue tang with acute short-term memory loss, who offers to help him find Nemo.
edge_2: Dory encounters Bruce while trying to help Marlin find Nemo.

edge_1: Bruce, Anchor, and Chum are three sharks who have sworn to abstain from eating fish.
edge_2: Anchor and Chum are encountered by Marlin, Dory, and the sharks during their search for Nemo.

edge_1: Dory encounters Bruce while trying to help Marlin find Nemo.
edge_2: Bruce, Anchor, and Chum are three sharks who have sworn to abstain from eating fish.

edge_1: Nemo is captured by a pair of scuba divers and placed in a fish tank in the office of dentist Philip Sherman in Sydney.
edge_2: Nemo starts his first day at school and has a heated argument with his father, Marlin, regarding his parenting approach.

edge_1: Nemo is captured by a pair of scuba divers and placed in a fish tank in the office of dentist Philip Sherman in Sydney.
edge_2: Nemo blocks the filter tube with a pebble to allow the Tank Gang to escape, but fails and is almost killed by the machinery.

edge_1: Gill is the leader of a group of fish in Nemo's tank, known as the Tank Gang.
edge_2: Nemo tells the Tank Gang of Marlin's quest, motivating them to carry out Gill's escape plan.
